title: Big Tiny: Life with the Jordans
overview: Series about the extraordinary life of the world's smallest siblings. In September 2011, 22-year-old Bridgette Jordan was crowned the World's Shortest Living Woman. Weighing only 18 pounds, she stands a diminutive, beyond-belief size of 28" (about the size of a six month old baby), while her younger brother Brad, weighs only 35 pounds and stands just 38" tall. Making them the world's shortest living brother and sister.
